column4: does anyone know if there are any repercussions to installing ubuntustudio audio video grapics meta packages inside regular ubuntu? i think it also installs the realtime kernel, so.. im wondering if this would break my system
heh, i dunno, i'm kinda not wanting to try stuff atm, just want to know if anyone did it successfully
you want the whole ubuntustudio suite? ubuntustudio-desktop is the package then
you can boot into gnome and use the apps, better most likely with the -rt kernel depending on your needs
